name: Camp
description:
Founded in 2009 and based in Austin, TX, Camp is a full-service advertising and content development company. Camp make brands matter to people through creative, data-driven solutions. 
At Camp, we work as a team. Strategy, media and creative sit at the same table from beginning to end, finding the best ways to connect people with our brands. The end result is a breakthrough creative dialogue that pulls people towards and into our brands.
